name: Crashy Cars (tszkoda)
description:
Crashy Cars is a game where you are controlling a car and you have to avoid the oncoming obstacles on the road.

If you hit an obstacle, the game is over.

The longer you survive, the more obstacles spawn in, making the game progressively harder.

Try to survive as long as possible and beat your score!

Music Credit:
